description: Try our easy to follow Quick White Chocolate Mousse recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick White Chocolate Mousse Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon the cold chocolate into serving dishes, decorate with broken shards of the pistachio praline and serve.
